tool.name: SAGA.imagery_maxent.1
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPRESENCE False isArrayFEATURES_NUM True isArrayFEATURES_CAT True isArrayYT_FILE_LOAD False isArrayYT_FILE_SAVE False output_data_PREDICTION $output_data_PREDICTION output_data_PROBABILITY $output_data_PROBABILITY name SAGA.imagery_maxent.1 PRESENCE $PRESENCE FEATURES_NUM $FEATURES_NUM FEATURES_CAT $FEATURES_CAT BACKGROUND $BACKGROUND METHOD $METHOD YT_FILE_LOAD $YT_FILE_LOAD YT_FILE_SAVE $YT_FILE_SAVE YT_REGUL $YT_REGUL YT_REGUL_VAL $YT_REGUL_VAL YT_NUMASREAL $YT_NUMASREAL DL_ALPHA $DL_ALPHA DL_THRESHOLD $DL_THRESHOLD DL_ITERATIONS $DL_ITERATIONS NUM_CLASSES $NUM_CLASSES prefer $prefer response $response outputType_PREDICTION $OutputSection_PREDICTION.outputType_PREDICTION transmissionMode_PREDICTION $OutputSection_PREDICTION.transmissionMode_PREDICTION outputType_PROBABILITY $OutputSection_PROBABILITY.outputType_PROBABILITY transmissionMode_PROBABILITY $OutputSection_PROBABILITY.transmissionMode_PROBABILITY

param.name: PRESENCE
param.label: Presence Data
param.help: Presence Data The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: FEATURES_NUM
param.label: Numerical Features
param.help: Numerical Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png

param.name: FEATURES_CAT
param.label: Categorical Features
param.help: Categorical Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, png

param.name: YT_FILE_LOAD
param.label: Load from File...
param.help: Load from File... The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: YT_FILE_SAVE
param.label: Save to File...
param.help: Save to File... The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_PREDICTION
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PREDICTION
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_PROBABILITY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PROBABILITY
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
